document.full_text: bed bath and beyond inc  forecast earnings growth for the current year that would beat wall street estimates, following a holiday season that saw u.s. shoppers spend more on home goods, and its shares jumped 9 percent.
document.title: bed bath full-year target tops estimates; shares soar
lines_and_colors: bed bath and beyond inc  forecast earnings growth for the current year that would beat wall street estimates, following a holiday season that saw u.s. shoppers spend more on home goods, and its shares jumped 9 percent.
